    <h1>Compatibility list</h1>

    <h3><a href="#introduction">1 Introduction</a></h3>
    <h3><a href="#options_menu">2 Options menu</a></h3>
    <h3><a href="#context_menu">3 Context menu</a></h3>

    <h3><a name="introduction">1 Introduction</a></h3>
    <p>
      This page shows the list of compatibilities for the selected garment.
      If you short press a compatibility you'll get its details shown.
    </p>
    <h3><a name="options_menu">2 Options menu</a></h3>
    <p>
      These are the options you can select:
      <h5>2.2 New compatibility</h5>
      Opens a form to enter a new compatibility's data.
    </p>
    <h3><a name="context_menu">3 Context menu</a></h3>
    <p>
      These are the options listed when you long press a compatibility:
      <h5>3.1 Edit compatibility</h5>
      Opens a form to edit compatibility's data.
      <h5>3.2 Delete compatibility</h5>
      Click on it to delete the compatibility.
    </p>
